project_objectives: Project ECOTONE (Energetic Connectivity Of Terrestrial and Oceanic Nearshore Ecosystems) uses camera trapping to address the role of land-based consumers in connecting coastal terrestrial habitats and adjacent marine systems on the California coast.
project_admin_organization: University of California Santa Barbara Department of Ecology, Evolution, and Marine Biology
data_citation: Zilz, Z.. 2022. Last updated July 2024. Project ECOTONE. http://n2t.net/ark:/63614/w12004085. Accessed via wildlifeinsights.org on 2024-07-22.
